text: How are benchmark angles useful in solving problems?

Benchmarks are helpful to estimate and sketch angle measures.

Students should have a set of benchmark angles:

  • 360˚ (1 turn),
  • 270˚ (3/4 turn),
  • 180˚ (1/2 turn),
  • 120˚ (1/3 turn),
  • 90˚ (1/4 turn),
  • 45˚ (1/8 turn),
  • 30˚ (1/12 of a turn).
